page.title: 16MARYON-WILSON FAMILY
page.content: The Maryon-Wilson family has been dominant in Grt Canfield from the mid 18C.until the present day.Sir Thomas Spencer Wilson,6th Baronet of Searle,Sussex,took the additional sur- name of Maryon in l876 when his wife inherited manorial rights and holdings in Canfield. Present Lord of the Manor is Mrs. G.M. M-W (aged 84) widow of former Rector Rev. John M-W. The 13th and last baronet was John's brother William (died l978) who lived at The Grange. His wife Janet died l985. There were no children of either marriage so the surname will pass from the village on the death of John's widow. Their farm is now owned by kinsman John Trevelyan, married: 3 sons, 1 daughter. There are memorials to the family in the Church. See also photo No. 3 of Lady Janet M-W presenting Cricket Club trophy l983.
